verses.text: \w Now|strong="H3117"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w old|strong="H2204"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w well|strong="H3966"\w* along \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w years|strong="H3117"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H7604"\w*, “\w You|strong="H3117"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w old|strong="H2204"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w well|strong="H3966"\w* along \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w years|strong="H3117"\w*, \w but|strong="H3068"\w* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w much|strong="H7235"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* land \w remains|strong="H7604"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w possessed|strong="H3423"\w*.
\w This|strong="H2063"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w remains|strong="H7604"\w*: All the territory of the Philistines and the Geshurites,

from the Shihor east of Egypt to the territory of Ekron on the north (considered to be Canaanite territory)—that of the five Philistine rulers of Gaza, Ashdod, Ashkelon, Gath, and Ekron, as well as that of the Avvites;
to the south, all the land of the Canaanites, from Mearah \f + \fr 13:4 \ft Or Arah\f* of the Sidonians to Aphek, as far as the border of the Amorites;
the land of the Gebalites;\f + \fr 13:5 \ft Or the area of Byblos\f* and all Lebanon to the east, from Baal-gad below Mount Hermon to Lebo-hamath.

\w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w hill|strong="H2022"\w* \w country|strong="H2022"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w Misrephoth-maim|strong="H4956"\w*—\w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Sidonians|strong="H6722"\w*—\w I|strong="H5704"\w* Myself \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w drive|strong="H3423"\w* \w out|strong="H3423"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*. \w Be|strong="H1121"\w* sure \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w divide|strong="H5307"\w* \w it|strong="H6440"\w* \w by|strong="H3478"\w* \w lot|strong="H5307"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w an|strong="H4480"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w therefore|strong="H6258"\w* \w divide|strong="H2505"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w land|strong="H5159"\w* \w as|strong="H5159"\w* \w an|strong="H2677"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w to|strong="H5159"\w* \w the|strong="H6258"\w* \w nine|strong="H8672"\w* \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* \w and|strong="H4519"\w* \w the|strong="H6258"\w* \w half-tribe|strong="H2677"\w* \w of|strong="H7626"\w* \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*.” The Inheritance East of the Jordan (Numbers 32:1–42; Deuteronomy 3:12–22)

\w The|strong="H5414"\w* \w other|strong="H5676"\w* half \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Manasseh, \w along|strong="H5973"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Reubenites|strong="H7206"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w Gadites|strong="H1425"\w*, \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w received|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w beyond|strong="H5676"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w east|strong="H4217"\w*, just \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w assigned|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*:
The area from Aroer on the rim of the Arnon Valley, along with the city in the middle of the valley, the whole plateau of Medeba as far as Dibon,
and all the cities of Sihon king of the Amorites who reigned in Heshbon, as far as the border of the Ammonites;
also Gilead and the territory of the Geshurites and Maacathites, all of Mount Hermon, and all Bashan as far as Salecah—

the whole kingdom of Og in Bashan, who had reigned in Ashtaroth and Edrei and had remained as a remnant of the Rephaim. \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w had|strong="H4872"\w* \w struck|strong="H5221"\w* \w them|strong="H5221"\w* \w down|strong="H5221"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w dispossessed|strong="H3423"\w* \w them|strong="H5221"\w*,

\w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w did|strong="H3478"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w drive|strong="H3423"\w* \w out|strong="H3423"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w Geshurites|strong="H1651"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w Maacathites|strong="H4602"\w*. \w So|strong="H3808"\w* \w Geshur|strong="H1650"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Maacath|strong="H4601"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w To|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w*, \w however|strong="H7535"\w*, \w Moses|strong="H3808"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*. \w The|strong="H5414"\w* \w offerings|strong="H3478"\w* \w made|strong="H5414"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* fire \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*, \w just|strong="H1696"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w promised|strong="H1696"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*. Reuben’s Inheritance

\w This|strong="H5414"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* what \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w had|strong="H4872"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w*:
The territory from Aroer on the rim of the Arnon Valley, along with the city in the middle of the valley, to the whole plateau beyond Medeba,
to Heshbon and all its cities on the plateau, including Dibon, Bamoth-baal, Beth-baal-meon,
Jahaz, Kedemoth, Mephaath,
Kiriathaim, Sibmah, Zereth-shahar on the hill in the valley,
Beth-peor, the slopes of Pisgah, and Beth-jeshimoth—

all the cities of the plateau and all the kingdom of Sihon king of the Amorites, who reigned in Heshbon until Moses killed him and the chiefs of Midian (Evi, Rekem, Zur, Hur, and Reba), the princes of Sihon who lived in the land.
The Israelites also killed the diviner Balaam son of Beor along with the others they put to the sword.

And the border of the Reubenites was the bank of the Jordan. \w This|strong="H2063"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* Reubenites, \w including|strong="H2063"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w villages|strong="H2691"\w*. Gad’s Inheritance

\w This|strong="H5414"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* what \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w had|strong="H4872"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w*:
The territory of Jazer, all the cities of Gilead, and half the land of the Ammonites as far as Aroer, near Rabbah;

the territory from Heshbon to Ramath-mizpeh and Betonim, and from Mahanaim to the border of Debir;\f + \fr 13:26 \ft LXX, Syriac, and Vulgate; Hebrew Li-debir, a variant of Lo-debar; see 2 Samuel 9:4, 2 Samuel 17:27, and Amos 6:13.\f*

and in the valley, Beth-haram, Beth-nimrah, Succoth, and Zaphon, with the rest of the kingdom of Sihon king of Heshbon (the territory on the east side of the Jordan up to the edge of the Sea of Chinnereth \f + \fr 13:27 \ft That is, the Sea of Galilee\f*).

\w This|strong="H2063"\w* \w was|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w Gadites|strong="H1410"\w*, \w including|strong="H2063"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w villages|strong="H2691"\w*. Manasseh’s Eastern Inheritance

\w This|strong="H5414"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* what \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w half-tribe|strong="H2677"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*, \w that|strong="H5414"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w*, \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*:

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w territory|strong="H1366"\w* \w from|strong="H1961"\w* \w Mahanaim|strong="H4266"\w* \w through|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w*—\w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4468"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Og|strong="H5747"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w*, \w including|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w towns|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Jair|strong="H2971"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H5892"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w*, \w sixty|strong="H8346"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*;

\w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*; \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ashtaroth|strong="H6252"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Edrei, \w the|strong="H2677"\w* royal \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Og|strong="H5747"\w* \w in|strong="H5892"\w* \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w*. All \w this|strong="H1121"\w* \w was|strong="H5892"\w* \w for|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H2677"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H2677"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Machir|strong="H4353"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*, \w that|strong="H5892"\w* \w is|strong="H5892"\w*, \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H2677"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Machir|strong="H4353"\w*.

These \w were|strong="H3383"\w* \w the|strong="H4872"\w* portions \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w had|strong="H4872"\w* given them \w on|strong="H5676"\w* \w the|strong="H4872"\w* \w plains|strong="H6160"\w* \w of|strong="H6160"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w beyond|strong="H5676"\w* \w the|strong="H4872"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, \w east|strong="H4217"\w* \w of|strong="H6160"\w* \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w*.

\w To|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w*, however, \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*. \w The|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*, \w just|strong="H1696"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w promised|strong="H1696"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*.
